metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add the smart switch to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your smart switch, press and release the manual/program button on the smart switch
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a smart switch from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your smart switch, press and release the manual/program button on the smart switch
metadata.reset:
1. If plugged in, unplug the smart switch from the receptacle.
2. Press and hold the program button for at least three seconds while you plug the smart switch into a receptacle
